title: Ale got hitched! [3 years ago]
content:
Bravo and best wishes for a happy life, Alejandro!

ChrisL

 [‹ Use character map to access alternate glyph](http://web.archive.org/web/20080512085844/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39184 "Go to previous forum topic") [Emigre Quartet ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080512085844/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39186 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content: Congratulations - I’d love to see a scan of the invite ;-)
Chris, it was close to 3 years ago... anyway thanks. Btw Si , i used Bickham pro. :)

Ale,  
I saw your post on Facebook where you said you changed your relationship status to “married” instead of “in a relationship” and assumed you meant you were recently married. Too much deduction on my part :-)

ChrisL

\>Chris, it was close to 3 years ago...

Still have to buy us all pints at TypeCon - it’s a Facebook/Typophile rule!

Mostly, you have to buy your wife pints from all of us as well! She needs it :-)

ChrisL
Si, I promise a pint to you at Buffalo but not sure if we should give one to Chris (maybe next year he will post about my new dog Zoe that will be 4 years old)... lol

People make facebook mistakes like that all the time. Especially since in the newsfeed section it doesn’t list specifics.  
So when you change your status to “engaged” to a good female friend to help her alleviate the embarrassment of breaking up with a long term boyfriend, you start receiving congratulation cards in the mail because no one bothered to check if you were -actually- engaged to your boyfriend.....
Congratulations, Ale. And thank you for Feel Script, which is lovely.
